pages.text: Stores and transfers RF. Cannot be used to recharge items in a player's inventory. It can be enchanted with $(l:thermal:world/holding)Holding$(/l) to improve RF capacity.

pages.title: Capacitato
pages.text: $(br2)$(o)'No tricks. This potato only generates 1.1 volts of electricity. I literally do not have the energy to lie to you.'
